name: Club Audition M
description:
The popular dance and rhythm game has arrived on your mobile devices.
Express yourself in fashion, dance, music, love, and more! Play with friends or meet new friends in Club Audition M.


Join our fun community! Challenge, build your FAM, fall in love, get groovin’!
Club Audition is free to play, come join the hottest mobile party in town!



Story Mode
Be the life of the party and bring your Audista adventure on mobile! Step up your dancing career in Club Audition M with the all-new Master mode! Get ready for 16 episodes full of music and rhythm!




Story Event
Watch the dance floor of the hottest mobile game light up as the party begins with Jessy Jackson and mizDat! New stories and rewards await you and your friends!




Couple
Find love on the dance floor! Falling and staying in love has never been this easy!


Dating System:
No more swiping left or right! Club Audition M will be your Cupid and match you with the most compatible dating partners using the advanced in-game automated search.


Couple Renewal:
Engagement rings? Promise rings? Wedding rings? Couples will never run out of options in expressing their feelings to their loved ones with the newest special rings, along with the newly updated and very intuitive User Interface.


Couple Mission:
Quality time will never get boring! New weekly missions and rewards for you and your partner to enjoy. Earning points and rewards DOES have to be romantic!
